product_name: Kokatat Gore-Tex Front Entry Dry Suit with Relief Zipper - Men's
long_description: The lightweight Kokatat Gore-Tex(R) Front Entry dry suit with relief zipper supplies splash protection for kayakers who want more comfort than neoprene wetsuits can provide. Tough nylon with Gore-Tex Pro Shell laminate is completely waterproof, extremely breathable and highly durable. Tough reinforcements at knees and seat boost abrasion resistance and durability. Neoprene neck gasket seals with skin to help keep water out. Specialized sleeves enhance freedom of motion and won't restrict movement when paddling. Waterproof front-entry zipper eases dressing and relief zipper speeds pit stops. Reflective highlights on front of suit enhance visibility in low light. Integrated Gore-Tex socks are more comfortable than latex gaskets and prevent water from entering suit at legs. Machine or hand wash in cold water with powdered detergent; do not bleach or dry clean; store dry, hanging or loosely folded.
short_description: The lightweight Kokatat Gore-Tex(R) Front Entry dry suit with relief zipper supplies splash protection for kayakers who want more comfort than neoprene wetsuits can provide.
